channel.title: NFSD on Machine Learning

item.title: NFS How-To
item.description: Update: 2017-01-06 Warn 1: for non-English, use samba/sshfs instead. unless win has NFS v4 or above which can solve non-UTF8 problems. Warn 2: svchost consumes 1.5GB ram, don’t know why. See Also Links SSHFS/SFTP CIFS/SMB/Samba OBS # Combining simlink (ln -s) with NFS may cause weird file path problems. We tried to have a link at NFS to Dropbox in nfs, also tried to have a link at home to mount point at /mnt.
